Subjects: Mary Magdalene, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Mary Magdalene, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[I]hesu cryst lowyt þu beþat for þine Inborne
                    pitte…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þat is in þe crage sa schorequhare of I tauld
                    ȝou here before
